hero.description: Web Developer focused on React, JavaScript and TypeScript.

project.memardoDesc: App to generate memes. Developed with React + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS

job.iiacEmployer: Archive of the Art and Culture Research Institute (UNTREF)
job.iiacBody: Maintenance and development of enhancements to AtoM archival description software (HTML, CSS, JS, PHP). Identification, classification, indexing and cataloging of archival documents.
job.culturaBody: Advice on the implementation of the union catalog for museum libraries and national institutes. Planning, database migration and implementation of Koha software.
job.bnmmBody: Development, support and training for Aleph software.
